ComicInfo.Penciller: Carlo Barberi,Rick Leonardi,Stan Sakai,Carlo Barberi,Stan Sakai,Rick Leonardi
ComicInfo.Summary: This month Aliens takes the spotlight in a tale from writer Mark Schultz and artist Rick Leonardi that ties in with Schultz's current series Aliens: Apocalypse. Then switch gears with Tony Millionaire's Sock Monkey as Sock Monkey and his pal Crow find yet another way to burn down the house!
ComicInfo.Title: Last Bus to Pandemonium; Death and Taxes; Once in a Lifetime
ComicInfo.Writer: Mark Schultz,Philip D. Amara,Dan Chichester,Stan Sakai,Dan Chichester,Stan Sakai,Mark Schultz,Philip D. Amara
